snippet.title: Brand new Apocryph's trailer. Apocryph - an old-school fantasy shooter / Hexen, Heretic, Painkiller
snippet.description:
Download Free pre-Alpha: http://www.bigzur.com

Brand new Apocryph's official trailer. Apocryph - an old-school fantasy shooter such as Hexen, Heretic, Painkiller and Strife.. 
Apocryph is a first person shooter set in a brutal dark fantasy world. It takes it's roots in old-school fantasy shooters such as #Hexen, #Heretic, #Painkiller and #Strife. Special 8-bit Mode of Apocryph will return you to the good old days.
